questions.Question_text: What is the difference between == and === in Python?
options: A. Both are used for comparison
B. === is not a valid operator in Python
questions.correct_answer: A. Both are used for comparison

questions.Question_text: How do you iterate over a dictionary in Python?
What is the purpose of the enumerate function in Python?
options: A. To get the index and value of an iterable
B. To get the length of an iterable
C. To check if an iterable is empty
questions.correct_answer: A. To get the index and value of an iterable

questions.Question_text: How do you handle exceptions in Python?
What is the difference between list and tuple in Python?
options: A. List is mutable while tuple is immutable
B. List is immutable while tuple is mutable
questions.correct_answer: A. List is mutable while tuple is immutable
